title: Tech Roundup: Social Media, User Data And Law Enforcement
teaser: Twitter, Apple, Snapchat, and Facebook are embroiled in controversies about the balance between protecting user data and cooperating with law enforcement. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with tech correspondent Steve Henn about the issue.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
